control.visible: [[Container.Content(Seasons) | Container.Content(Episodes)] + stringcompare(ListItem.Label,..)] + ![Container.Content(Seasons) + Skin.HasSetting(TVShowsExtraFanart) + !IsEmpty(Control.GetLabel(6105)) + !stringcompare(ListItem.Label,..)] + ![Container.Content(Episodes) + Skin.HasSetting(TVShowsExtraFanart) + !IsEmpty(Control.GetLabel(6106)) + !stringcompare(ListItem.Label,..)] + !IsEmpty(Fanart.Image) + ![[Control.IsVisible(592) | Control.IsVisible(598)] + !Window.IsVisible(MovieInformation)] + ![Player.HasVideo + Skin.HasSetting(VideoBackgrounds)]

![Container.Content(Movies) + Skin.HasSetting(MoviesExtraFanart) + !IsEmpty(Control.GetLabel(6102))] + ![[Container.Content(TVShows) | Container.Content(Seasons)] + Skin.HasSetting(TVShowsExtraFanart) + !IsEmpty(Control.GetLabel(6105))] + ![Container.Content(Episodes) + Skin.HasSetting(TVShowsExtraFanart) + !IsEmpty(Control.GetLabel(6106))] + ![Container.Content(MusicVideos) + Skin.HasSetting(MusicVideosExtraFanart) + !IsEmpty(Control.GetLabel(6107))] + !IsEmpty(ListItem.Property(Fanart_Image)) + ![[Control.IsVisible(592) | Control.IsVisible(598)] + !Window.IsVisible(MovieInformation)] + ![Player.HasVideo + Skin.HasSetting(VideoBackgrounds)]

[Control.IsVisible(50) | Control.IsVisible(55) | Control.IsVisible(57) | Control.IsVisible(590) | Control.IsVisible(596)] + Container.Content(Movies) + ![substring(ListItem.Path,plugin://) | substring(ListItem.Path,special://videoplaylists/) | substring(Container.FolderPath,plugin://) | substring(Container.FolderPath,addons://)]

animation.condition: Window.IsVisible(ShutdownMenu) | Window.IsVisible(FileBrowser) | Window.IsVisible(FileBrowser) | Window.IsVisible(MediaSource) | Window.IsVisible(ProfileSettings) | Window.IsVisible(LockSettings) | Window.IsVisible(ContentSettings) | Window.IsVisible(Favourites) | Window.IsVisible(SongInformation) | Window.IsVisible(SmartPlaylistEditor) | Window.IsVisible(PictureInfo) | Window.IsVisible(MusicInformation) | Window.IsVisible(MovieInformation) | Window.IsVisible(TextViewer) | Window.IsVisible(PluginSettings) | Window.IsVisible(script-XBMC_Lyrics-settings.xml) | Window.IsVisible(script-GmailChecker-main.xml) | Window.IsVisible(script-svnri-iteminfo.xml) | Window.IsVisible(script-xbmc-audio-mixer.xml)
